name: interculturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or involves more than one culture: There are no real efforts to live interculturally, or to really get to know others. How can we get students to be inter-culturally sensitive and appreciate alternative value systems?
More examplesFewer examplesBioethicists will have to explore these issues internationally and interculturally.Despite the face of Australian society developing interculturally, European educational structures are still firmly entrenched.Only interculturally competent teachers can be expected to develop positive attitudes in their students.
